snippet: Steven Koch, Credit Suisse's co-chairman of mergers and acquisitions, will leave his perch at the Swiss bank to become a deputy mayor of Chicago in Rahm Emanuel's administration.
abstract: Steven Koch, Credit Suisse's co-chairman of mergers and acquisitions, will leave his perch at the Swiss bank to become a deputy mayor of Chicago in Rahm Emanuel's administration.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Top Credit Suisse Deal Maker to Take Post in Chicago
